message:
SYSTEM: FernandezM.Feb2019.pdf: Página 12
Objective 3 (factors that hamper reuse) required a qualitative
approach
It was achieved basing on the authors’ experience in a real ontology
development use case. Once the use case had been analysed, the
generalisation study was carried out computationally by checking if the
obstacles found in candidate ontologies to reuse in the use case were
present in other LOV ontologies.
Fern´andez, Poveda, Su´arez, G´omez
Ontology reuse across the same domain
February 21, 2019
12 / 43
speaker: SYSTEM
